About FLINGING FLIES.

My name is Travis. I graduated from college a little over a two years ago with a Bachelors in Fisheries Biology. I worked for a consulting firm upon graduating from college. I quickly learned that it wasn't for me. I taught myself how to write code and now work for a software company where I run the Support team. I am passionate about fly fishing, travel, and learning. I started this site to share my love for a sport that so many want to try but have never had anyone to show them. Welcome!
